Class IdCardAutoSnappingController

    public class IdCardAutoSnappingController
extends BaseAutoSnappingController

    Controls auto-snapping for id card scanning.

    • Method Detail

      • runPredicates

        protected boolean runPredicates(@NotNull
                                io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdCardAutoSnappingController.Param param)

        Run particular implementation's autosnapping conditions checks.

        Note the ability to specify predicates order together with distinguishing logical operators that short-circuit ('&&' and '||') and those that validate both sides of comparison (inflix 'and', 'or')

        Returns:
        true if autosnapping conditions are met and image can be taken now.

      • detach

        public void detach()

        Allows to detach successor implementation class. To be called in place of usage when screen hierarchy is being destroyed.

      • attach

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static IdCardAutoSnappingController attach(@NotNull
                                                                       IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                                                       @NotNull
                                                                       IdCardScanner idCardScanner)

        Convenience method for attaching class IdCardAutoSnappingController to interface IScanbotCameraView

        Auto-snapping is enabled by default as soon as you create new instance of class IdCardAutoSnappingController. You can manually enable or disable auto-snapping by setting IdCardAutoSnappingController.isEnabled.

        Parameters:
        cameraView - cameraView to attach to
        idCardScanner - idCardScanner to process frames and get live detection results
        Returns:
        new instance of class IdCardAutoSnappingController
        See Also:
        class IdCardAutoSnappingController, interface IScanbotCameraView, class IdCardAutoSnappingController, IdCardAutoSnappingController.isEnabled, detach

      • attach

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static IdCardAutoSnappingController attach(@NotNull
                                                                       IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                                                       @NotNull
                                                                       IdCardScannerFrameHandler frameHandler)

        Convenience method for attaching class IdCardAutoSnappingController to interface IScanbotCameraView

        Auto-snapping is enabled by default as soon as you create new instance of class IdCardAutoSnappingController. You can manually enable or disable auto-snapping by setting IdCardAutoSnappingController.isEnabled.

        Parameters:
        cameraView - cameraView to attach to
        frameHandler - IdCardScannerFrameHandler to process frames and get live detection results
        Returns:
        new instance of class IdCardAutoSnappingController
